segments.text: I can't believe how careless that woman is being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and she's just standing there, drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is making a huge mess, and she doesn't even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the water, for goodness' sake!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the children trying to get cookies from the jar, and she's completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks so unstable; the boy could fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she needs to pay more attention to her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, but inside, it's a different story.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised she hasn't noticed the water overflowing yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to alert her before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
